524350.name: TileDynasty FPS Arena
524350.description:
Set in an Apocalyptic World, you play as a renegade with incredible endurance and speed, demolishing enemies with arcade like weapons.
TileDynasty is an FPS Arena, where Players can work together against AI Enemies or go head-to-head accomplishing objectives within each game mode.


WEAPONS
    GRENADE LAUNCHER
    RIFLE
    MACHINE GUN
    ROCKET LAUNCHER
    PORTER GUN

MOVEMENT: Designed for fluid-like motion, coupled with Wall Movement, use multiple approaches to get to different platforms to your strategy!

LEVELS: Maps will be designed to tailor to the 'Arcade-Feel' of the game

CURRENT MODES:
    SEARCH AND RESCUE: Locate the hostages in each map and escort them back to the rescue zone, and defend the hostages from the enemy

    TEAM DEATH MATCH: Head-To-Head online with friends or against AI
524350.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
